name: Alimardan's Mischief
description: “Ali Mardan’s Mischief’s” is a cheerful musical game directed at children that narrates the naughty behavior of a little boy who has driven everyone nuts with his shenanigans! No matter how easy or appealing naughtiness, messing up the kitchen, putting banana peels on the floor, and poking chickens with sticks might seem, it is not so...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp/7/8.1/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible sound card Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard
